评论详情: The fit was great for the quality of the dress and value. It has a decent amount of stretch to it which I can appreciate! It hugs in the right places for sure!
In my opinion this dress was made very cheaply. Definitely returning
Well made true to size very impressed
Great for costume you need to wear once. The train Totally fell apart after the first wear but it was very pretty before that
fits perfect and is comfortable to wear!

I ordered this dress in a small. I'm 5'2" 129lbs and it fit perfectly! My date and I turned heads everywhere we went. We even won a costume contest from it! The material isn't itchy but it's stretchy! My only wish was that it was longer but other than that, 10/10!

评论概述: Perfect Fit but Runs a Bit Big
评论详情: Love the dress! Runs slightly big because I’m usually a medium and this dress is a size small. Very comfortable, I can’t wait to wear it for Halloween!

This is a cute Morticia cosplay outfit. It's better than I expected honestly. The dress is a soft velour/velvet material that's so much nicer than some costume outfits. This could be a cute cosplay when done right.
I ordered a medium and then a small and can’t tell a difference in the sizes. They fit the same.
